Timestamper
===========


About
-----
A tiny tool that adds timestamp prefix to each piped line.

Installation
------------

    npm install -g timestamper


Usage
-----

    $ ./slow.sh
    This
    is
    slow

    $ ./slow.sh | ts
    [2012-05-30 18:45:45]: This
    [2012-05-30 18:45:46]: is
    [2012-05-30 18:45:47]: slow

    $ cat ./slow.sh
    #!/usr/bin/env bash
    echo "This"
    sleep 1
    echo "is"
    sleep 1
    echo "slow"
